snippet.title: Odinfall Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
A new gameplay trailer for Odinfall was broadcast during the Summer Showcase, giving us a first glimpse into the post-apocalyptic world where you can take on robot Odin an acid-spewing minigun as a Moose. Odinfall launches on Steam Early Access this summer! Be sure to add it to your Steam Wishlist now. #FutureGamesShow #FGS


#FutureGamesShow #FGS
